channel.title: Makerspaces on T-RAX Chalmers Makerspace
channel.description: Recent content in Makerspaces on T-RAX Chalmers Makerspace

item.title: Electronics lab
item.description:
• About

About

Are you fascinated by the fundamentals of electronics and eager to bring your ideas to life? Step into our Basic Electronics Lab, where the essentials meet innovation. Our lab provides the core tools you need to embark on your journey into the world of electronics.

Here, you'll find a selection of basic soldering stations, ideal for assembling simple circuits and learning the art of soldering. Our oscilloscopes, while fundamental, are perfect for introducing you to the visualization of electronic signals. With a variety of basic electronic components like resistors, capacitors, and LEDs, you can start building and experimenting right away.

We also offer breadboards for easy prototyping without the need for permanent soldering, making it ideal for beginners and those looking to test their ideas quickly. Join us in our electronics workshops for an introductory experience, or contact us with your queries. Our Basic Electronics Lab is a starting point for curiosity and creativity in the electronic world.

item.title: Film and pod studio
item.description:
• About

About

The Film & Podcast Studio at T-RAX is a versatile space crafted for creators of all levels! Our studio is fully equipped with professional-grade cameras, lighting setups, microphones, soundproofing, and editing software to support both video and audio projects. Whether you're recording a podcast, filming a short film, or producing online content, our studio offers everything you need to bring your ideas to life. We also have editing stations and green screens to enhance your production capabilities. To get started, please sign up for our next studio session. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us!

item.title: Fuse Box
item.description:
• About
  • Storage rules and information

About

The Fuse Box is a dedicated area for T-RAX courses and equipment storage, designed to support hands-on learning and practical applications.
This space is equipped with organized storage solutions for tools, materials, and project supplies, ensuring everything you need is easily accessible. It's also the primary location for T-RAX courses.

Whether you're here to expand your knowledge through a course or to manage and organize equipment for your projects, the Fuse Box is designed to keep things efficient and functional.

item.title: Metal
item.description:
• About
  • Access to XPs metall workshop

About

The metal workshop at T-RAX is your ultimate creative playground! Our workshop provides an array of tools and machines that empower you to turn metal into custom-crafted masterpieces limited only by your imagination. Among the equipment at your disposal are saws, a lathe, welding equipment, milling machine, and hydraulic press. Furthermore, we offer a variety of specialized grinders and dedicated workstations to support your metalworking endeavors. To gain access to our facilities, simply enroll in our next metalworking course. If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to us!

item.title: Rapid prototyping
item.description:
• About

About

Are you passionate about innovation, technology, and design? Ever wanted to explore the limitless possibilities of turning your ideas into tangible prototypes?
Welcome to our Rapid Prototyping Lab, where your creativity meets technology! Our lab is equipped with tools designed to bring your concepts to life.

Here, you'll find 3D printers capable of printing in a variety of materials, such as PLA and PETG - plus, we provide free filament to help you bring your projects to life without added costs. We also feature a high-precision laser cutter, ideal for intricate designs and precise cuts in materials like wood and acrylic. Additionally, our lab includes a waterjet cutter, perfect for cutting a wide range of materials with exceptional accuracy. Sign up for our next prototyping course to get hands-on experience, or contact us with any questions.

item.title: Surface treatment
item.description:
• About

About

The Surface Treatment Workshop at T-RAX is designed to bring out the finest finishes for your projects! Our workshop provides an array of tools and equipment to help you achieve professional-level results. Available resources include a spray booth and sand blaster, all aimed at giving your work the perfect final touch. If you'd like to use the workshop, please sign up for our next surface treatment course. For any questions, feel free to reach out to us!

item.title: Textile workshop
item.description:
• About

About

Are you intrigued by the world of fabric, colors, and design? Have you ever wanted to unlock the secrets of creating beautiful textiles and transforming ordinary materials into works of art? Look no further! Our Textile Workshop is the perfect place for you to unleash your creativity, learn new skills, and immerse yourself in the captivating world of textiles. In the textile workshop, you can find two industrial sewing machines and an overlock machine.

Moreover, we have a heat press that can be used to print on textiles, in combination with a vinyl cutter and a sublimation printer. Additionally, we offer a variety of textile tools and other resources that may be needed during your creative process. If you are interested in using our facilities, please sign up for the next textile-course. Also, if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us!

item.title: Wood workshop
item.description:
• About

About

The wood workshop at T-RAX is the perfect place for you to unleash your creativity! Our wood workshop offers a wide range of tools and machines that can help you transform a simple log into beautifully designed furniture or whatever your imagination can conceive. Some of the machines available include a panel saw, band saw, jointer-planer, and drill press. Additionally, we have various types of sanders and preparation areas to assist with your woodworking projects. If you are interested in using our facilities, please sign up for the next wood-course. Also, if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us!
